summary: This document contains email exchanges from September 2008 between Jeffery Edwards and an unnamed recipient, discussing Edwards' confinement and making light of the situation with references to Vaseline and keeping a diary. The tone is informal and suggests Edwards is in some form of detention.

persons.name: Jeffery Edwards
persons.context: Appears to be emailing from confinement, receiving advice and jokes from an unnamed friend, and discussing sending photos.

events.title: Email exchange about confinement
events.description: Unnamed correspondent emails Jeffery Edwards, expressing disappointment about not seeing him in New York, joking about sending Vaseline, and offering support.

events.title: Follow-up email requesting photos
events.description: Jeffery Edwards responds to an earlier email, making light of the Vaseline joke and requesting photos be sent.

keyFacts: Jeffery Edwards was in some form of confinement or detention in September 2008.
The correspondence includes a crude joke about sending Vaseline to Edwards, implying concerns about prison conditions.
Edwards requests photos from the unnamed correspondent.
The tone suggests the correspondent is a close friend or associate offering support during Edwards' confinement.
